title: Which is the best poetry blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kavishala is very excellent platform for new age poetry, I think. Speciality is that anyone can publish his/her writings & can connect with poets/writers socially as well. कविशाला नए लोगों के लिए बेहतरीन मंच है ताकि लिखने की आदत आ सके व अधिकतम सीखा जा सके. Rekhta is good for Urdu Literature.

there are many blogs related to Urdu Poetry some usefull links of them here http://www.urdupoetry.com www.rekhta.org/ Urdu Poetry - 2 Lines Poetry in Urdu, Ghazal, Nazam Urdu Poetry & Shayari | Ranjish.com Love & Sad Shayari & Ghazals, Best Urdu Poem Collection Urdu Poetry at UrduLIfe.com Urdu Shayari selected collection
